summary: Provides an asynchronous client for the Huobi Japan cryptocurrency exchange, enabling retrieval of market data, account balances, order books, and trade history, as well as placement, modification, and cancellation of orders, management of withdrawals and deposits, and handling of request signing and error processing.
business_intent: Allow developers to programmatically interact with the Huobi Japan exchange for automated trading, data collection, and account management within asynchronous Python applications.
